    #include <stdio.h>
    #include <math.h>
     
    int max(int a,int b)
    {
        if(a>b)
            return a;
        else return b;
    }
    int min(int a,int b)
    {
        if(a<b)
            return a;
        else return b;
    }
     
    int main(void) {
    	
    	int count ;
    	int i ;
    	
    	scanf("%d", &count) ;
    	for (i = 0 ; i < count ; i ++)
    	{
    	    int x1, y1, x2, y2 ;
    	    int x3, y3, x4, y4 ;
    	    int a ;
    	    int b1, b2 ;
    	    
    	    scanf("%d %d %d %d", &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2) ;
    	    scanf("%d %d %d %d", &x3, &y3, &x4, &y4) ;
    	    
    	    a = (x2-x1)*(y2-y1) + (x4-x3)*(y4-y3) ;
    	    
    	    b1 = min(x2, x4) - max(x1, x3) ;
            b2 = min(y2, y4) - max(y1, y3) ;
    	    
    	    if (b1 > 0 && b2 > 0)
    	         a = a - b1*b2 ;
    	    printf("%d \n", a) ;
    	    
    	}
    	
    	return 0;
    }
